titleStmt.title: The drunkards vvarning A sermon preached at Canterbury in the Cathedral Church of Christ. By Thomas Kingsmill Mr. of Arts, and preacher of the Word at Hyth, one of the Cinque-ports, in the county of Kent.
titleStmt.author: Kingsmill, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: By N. Okes for Richard Collins at the signe of the three Kings in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A warning for drunkards.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the three Kings in Paules Church-yard
